official_title: A resolution to provide the commendation of the Senate to the Skylab III crew for their successful mission, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Senate that the mission of the Skylab III astronnauts, Captain Alan L. Bean (U.S. Navy) Commander, Major Jack R. Lousma (U.S. Marine Corps.), pilot and Dr. Owen K. Garriott, and their support teams on the ground, ending successfully man's longest stay in space, deserve the heartfelt thanks of all mankind.

titles.title: A resolution to provide the commendation of the Senate to the Skylab III crew for their successful mission, and for other purposes.
